subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A day before their showdown with the European champion Metallurg Magnitogorsk, the Rangers scored six power-play goals in an 8-1 victory over the SC Bern Bears.
snippet: A day before their showdown with the European champion Metallurg Magnitogorsk, the Rangers scored six power-play goals in an 8-1 victory over the SC Bern Bears.
